metadata.instructions: This file is read by the agent to understand the current task queue. Tasks are defined in order of priority.

tasks.title: Improve CLI launcher (xyndril.py)
tasks.description: Add argument parsing for running .nx files directly via CLI, e.g., `xyndril run examples/hello.nx`.

tasks.title: Define REPL behavior
tasks.description: Draft REPL interface logic in `src/repl.py`. This includes prompt loop, command execution, and session state.

tasks.title: Add parser_spec.md to nav
tasks.description: Make sure parser_spec.md is added to mkdocs.yml navigation.

tasks.title: Implement basic parser
tasks.description: Create a basic parser in `parser/parser.py` that can parse simple expressions using the grammar defined in `xyndril.g4`.

tasks.title: Expand parser.py to AST structure
tasks.description: Extend the parser in `parser/parser.py` to build an AST structure aligned with `src/ast.py`. Ensure the parser generates nodes for basic expressions.

tasks.title: Sync parser_spec.md with parser logic
tasks.description: Update `docs/parser_spec.md` to reflect the current parser logic in `parser/parser.py`, including AST generation details.

tasks.title: Create tests for parser and interpreter
tasks.description: Write unit tests in `test/parser/test_parser.py` for the parser and in `test/interpreter/test_interpreter.py` for the interpreter. Use unittest or pytest.

tasks.title: Complete REPL to match parser structure
tasks.description: Update `src/repl.py` to integrate with the new parser and AST structure. Ensure REPL can execute simple expressions parsed into AST nodes.

tasks.title: Create server.py draft or plan
tasks.description: Draft a basic `server.py` in `server/` directory to serve as a foundation for a language server or runtime. Alternatively, create a plan in `server/README.md`.
